means: 在…装窃听器（bug的过去式与过去分词形式）

sentence.Network_en: It's an open secret that the security service bugged telephones.
sentence.Network_cn: 安全部门窃听电话是人人皆知的秘密。

sentence.Network_en: Fraud squad officers had bugged the phone and were ready to pounce.
sentence.Network_cn: 反诈骗小组的警员们已在电话上安装了窃听器，并随时准备突击。

sentence.Network_en: I found out my phone was bugged.
sentence.Network_cn: 我发现我的电话被窃听了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: The president covered the fact that he bugged the offices in the white house ., 总统掩盖了他在白宫办公室安装窃听器的事实.
The police have bugged my office ., 警察在我办公室装了窃听器.
this phone can be bugged . I suspect that my phone is being bugged .这部电话可以被装窃听器于。我怀疑我的电话正被装窃听器于。

亦称六月甲虫、六月虫(June bug)、五月甲虫(May beetle)。 鞘翅目(Coleoptera)金龟科(Scarabaeidae)鳃角金龟亚科(Melolonthinae) …
动物名英语_百度文库 ... starling 八哥 stink bug 椿象 kangaroo 袋鼠.

entry.def: A bug is an insect or similar small creature.

example.ex: We noticed tiny bugs that were all over the walls.
example.tran: 我们注意到墙上爬满了小虫子。

example.ex: ...a bloodsucking bug which infests poor housing.
example.tran: 贫民区滋生的一种吸血的虫子

entry.def: A bug is an illness which is caused by small organisms such as bacteria.

example.ex: I think I've got a bit of a stomach bug...
example.tran: 我想我的胃可能出了点儿毛病。

example.ex: There was a bug going around at the club.
example.tran: 这个俱乐部流行着一种轻微的传染病。

entry.tran: （计算机程序中的）漏洞，错误，故障
entry.def: If there is a bug in a computer program, there is a mistake in it.

example.ex: There is a bug in the software.

entry.def: A bug is a tiny hidden microphone which transmits what people are saying.

example.ex: There was a bug on the phone.

entry.def: If someone bugs a place, they hide tiny microphones in it which transmit what people are saying.

example.ex: He heard that they were planning to bug his office...
example.tran: 他得知他们打算在他办公室安装窃听器。

example.ex: I found out my phone was bugged.
example.tran: 我发现我的电话被窃听了。

entry.def: You can say that someone has been bitten by a particular bug when they suddenly become very enthusiastic about something.

example.ex: I've definitely been bitten by the gardening bug...
Roundhay Park in Leeds was the place I first got the fishing bug.
example.tran: 利兹市的朗德海公园是我首次对钓鱼着迷的地方。

entry.def: If someone or something bugs you, they worry or annoy you.

example.ex: I only did it to bug my parents.
example.tran: 我这么做只是为了让我父母心烦。

auth_sentence.content: That's just what bugged the hell out of Harold Ross.
auth_sentence.res_content: That's just what bugged the hell out of Harold Ross.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That's just what bugged the hell out of Harold Ross.

auth_sentence.content: Hence please do not be bugged down in the so-called mathematical jungle.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hence please do not be bugged down in the so-called mathematical jungle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hence please do not be bugged down in the so-called mathematical jungle.

auth_sentence.content: This is something that always bugged me about the accelerating universe idea.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is something that always bugged me about the accelerating universe idea.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is something that always bugged me about the accelerating universe idea.
